trans-unit.source: Represents a reference to a method.
A <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression> can be used to represent an expression of the form Object.Method.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression.TargetObject%2A> property indicates the object that contains the method.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression.MethodName%2A> property indicates the name of the method.

A <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression> is used with a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodInvokeExpression> to indicate the method to invoke, and with a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeDelegateCreateExpression> to indicate the method to handle the event.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression"></xref> class using the specified target object and method name.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the object to target.
The name of the method to call.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression"></xref> class using the specified target object, method name, and generic type arguments.
The `typeParameters` parameter represents a collection of type references to be substituted for the type parameter references of the current generic method.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the object to target.
The name of the method to call.

An array of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference"></xref> values that specify the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression.TypeArguments"></xref> for this <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression"></xref>.
Gets or sets the name of the method to reference.
The name of the method to reference.
Gets or sets the expression that indicates the method to reference.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that represents the method to reference.
Gets the type arguments for the current generic method reference expression.

The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression.TypeArguments%2A> property represents a collection of type references to be substituted for the type parameter references of the current generic method.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReferenceCollection"></xref> containing the type arguments for the current code <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeMethodReferenceExpression"></xref>.
